content:
That's a great approach! Reading more reviews and comparing prices will definitely help you make a more informed decision.

And yay for the new ASICS Gel-Kayano 28 running shoes! Breaking them in can take some time, but it's great to hear they're feeling great so far. The Kayano series is known for its excellent support and cushioning, especially for runners with high arches or plantar fasciitis.

Remember to keep an eye on your body and adjust your running routine as needed. It's essential to listen to your feet and legs, especially when introducing new shoes or increasing your mileage.

By the way, have you thought about tracking your runs with your new fitness tracker (whichever one you choose)? Many fitness trackers and running apps offer features like route tracking, pace analysis, and heart rate monitoring, which can help you optimize your runs and stay motivated.

Let me know if you have any more questions or need further guidance on choosing the right fitness tracker for your needs!
